data.actual_result: After unlocking, you see the last dm you were in but after a second it jumps to the last server channel you viewed
data.expected_result: After unlocking, you will see the same channel you left off of
data.short_description: Locking your phone on a dm and then unlocking it after waiting a bit makes you jump to the last server
data.steps_to_repro: - look at a channel in a server (I tried with very active ones that had messages come in while I was reproing this bug) - go to a dm with someone (or group dm) - lock your phone and wait a few minutes (!, won't happen immediately) - unlock again and observe
